## Overview

**Slice Type:** Feature Enhancement
**Priority:** Medium
**Effort:** 6 hours
**Risk:** Low
**Dependencies:** VS-04 (calculation engine)

Add advanced mathematical operations: square root, square, and percentage calculations.

## User Story

```
As a user
I want advanced math operations
So that I can perform more complex calculations
```

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Square root (√) button functional
- [ ] Square (x²) button functional
- [ ] Percentage (%) button functional
- [ ] Proper error handling (e.g., √ of negative)
- [ ] Keyboard shortcuts available
- [ ] Results maintain precision

## Technical Requirements

**Advanced Operations:**

```javascript
function squareRoot(value) {
  const num = parseFloat(value);
  if (num < 0) {
    return { error: true, message: "Cannot calculate √ of negative number" };
  }
  return { error: false, result: Math.sqrt(num).toString() };
}

function square(value) {
  const num = parseFloat(value);
  return { error: false, result: (num * num).toString() };
}

function percentage(value, base) {
  // Percentage of base: (value / 100) * base
  const percent = parseFloat(value);
  const baseNum = parseFloat(base);
  return { error: false, result: ((percent / 100) * baseNum).toString() };
}
```

**UI Components:**

- √ button
- x² button
- % button

## Implementation Checklist

- [ ] Implement square root function
- [ ] Implement square function
- [ ] Implement percentage function
- [ ] Add error handling for square root of negative

- [ ] Style buttons
- [ ] Write unit tests for all operations
